attributes.action: Formally direct the 'Gambling Commission' to allow the promotion 'Win a Devon property with Fishing' to proceed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As the holders of the property followed all obligations as directed by the 'Gambling Commission' and now be told that they may be in breach of the act is typical bureaucratic hinderance.
As for the clause in the act stating 'significant', what an obscene use of the English language, it is only legalese, that most individuals or organisation can not afford to contest in a court of law..

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
